grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 朱【シュ】cinnabar, vermillion, red, slightly-orange red, red pigment (and ink made from same), red text (as used to correct documents)
堆朱【ツイシュ】red lacquerware with patterns carved in relief
kun reading compounds: 朱に染まる【あけにそまる】to welter in blood, to be covered in blood
